translation: Even a wise man acts in accordance with his own nature; beings will follow their nature; what can restraint do?
commentary: 3.33 Similar in accordance? Cheshtate acts? Svasyaḥ of his own? prakritiḥ of nature? wise a wise man? Even even? prakritim to nature? go follow? Bhootani beings? restraint: restraint? What what? will do will do.Commentary He who reads this verse will come to the conclusion that there is no scope for mans personal exertion. It is not so. Read the following verse. It clearly indicates that man can
